criteria: Effective Use of Maps, Tables, Graphs, Photographs, and Charts
descriptions: No geographic descriptions are provided or are completely inaccurate.
Provides minimal geographic descriptions with significant inaccuracies.
Describes some geographic features and human elements, but with noticeable inaccuracies.
Describes the physical and human geography with reasonable accuracy.
Provides accurate and detailed descriptions of physical and human geography, demonstrating good understanding.
Provides comprehensive and insightful descriptions of physical and human geography, demonstrating excellent understanding and nuanced detail.
No maps, tables, graphs, photographs or charts are used.
Uses maps, tables, graphs, photographs or charts ineffectively or inappropriately.
Uses some maps, tables, graphs, photographs or charts, but they are not well-integrated or explained.
Uses maps, tables, graphs, photographs or charts to support information, but the connection could be stronger.
Effectively integrates maps, tables, graphs, photographs or charts to organize and present information clearly.
Masterfully uses a variety of maps, tables, graphs, photographs or charts to present information in a compelling and insightful manner.
Information is disorganized and unclear.
Information is poorly organized and difficult to follow.
Information is somewhat organized but lacks clarity in places.
Information is organized and presented in a generally clear manner.
Information is well-organized and clearly presented, enhancing understanding.
Information is exceptionally well-organized and presented with outstanding clarity, providing profound insight.
Fails to demonstrate understanding of spatial context.
Demonstrates a very limited understanding of spatial context.
Shows some awareness of spatial context, but the connection is weak.
Connects information to spatial context in a basic way.
Clearly demonstrates understanding of spatial context and its relevance.
Demonstrates a deep and nuanced understanding of spatial context, offering insightful connections and implications.
